tuv.seg: 'A book said to be at its holder's behest.'
一本据说能满足所有要求的书
在火炉旁找个位置坐下来！
'A sight to dwell upon and never forget'
吸血鬼特饮（符合素食主义）
'All good things end with a bang... or many!'
一切美好的事物都将归于一声砰。如果一声不行，那就再来一声。
'An apple a day keeps Dr Bones away!'
每日一苹果，医生远离我
'Are you suggesting that coconuts can migrate?'
你是想说椰子可以飘洋过海吗？
'Barbecue it, boil it, broil it, bake it...'
过敏提示：配方中不含鸟妖，不保证配料中不含鸟妖
你好啊阿黑，好久没见了
'How can I have some more of nothing?'
'I didn't get this from the Grid'
我没有从格子里拿到这个！
'I didn't get this off of a Schmoo'
有点像毛球，不过更加“活跃”一点
'Not even water can put the flame out'
不宜用于日常使用型鹦鹉
'Nothing is as Terrarian as apple pie.'
'Only the best, most exquisite flower excrement!'
只有最优雅、最秀丽的花才能入选
'Rend your foes asunder with a spear of light!'
以破晓之光将敌人撕成碎片
'Sometimes carried by creatures in dark deserts'
存在于一些黑暗沙漠里的怪物身上
'Sustain a bloody fraction of the Moon'
隐含着鲜红之月的一部分...
'This will prove to be a terrible idea'
这多半是个危险的想法
'What a horrible night to have a curse.'
真是个可怕的诅咒之夜啊
总有一天，你也会和我一样强！
10% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
提升10%近战伤害和暴击率
提升10%召唤伤害和魔法伤害
10% increased minion damage, 20% increased magic critical strike chance and movement speed
提升10%召唤伤害，提升20%魔法暴击率和移动速度
11% increased magic damage and critical strike chance
提升11%魔法伤害和暴击率
12% increased magic damage and critical strike chance
提升12%魔法伤害和暴击率
提升15%魔法伤害和召唤伤害
20% increased minion damage and 10% increased magic damage
提升20%召唤伤害，提升10%魔法伤害
20% increased minion damage and 25% increased magic critical strike chance
提升20%召唤伤害，提升25%魔法暴击率
30% increased minion damage and 15% increased magic damage
提升30%召唤伤害，提升15%魔法伤害
33% chance to not consume potion crafting ingredients
制作药水时有33%几率不消耗材料
提升4点被标记的敌人所受到的召唤伤害
提升8%暴击率提升4%暴击率
5% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
提升5%近战伤害和暴击率
8% increased melee damage and critical strike chance
提升8%近战伤害和暴击率
A Painter will move in and sell paints if enough townsfolk move in.
如果已经有许多NPC入住了，那么出售涂料的油漆人也会跟着入住。
A Pumpkin Medallion can be used to summon the Pumpkin Moon.
南瓜月纪念章可以用来召唤南瓜月。
A Stone Slab variant that merges differently with nearby blocks
一种特殊的石板，可以和周围的方块融合
A bitter harvest rises in the dead of night.
苦涩渐渐在死寂之夜中升起。
A blue lunar seal protected by powerful guardians.
被强大的守护者捍卫的蓝月封印。
A charge is used to damage enemies you touch
冲刺，对冲撞到的敌人造成伤害和爆炸。
A glistening, dark material adorns the caverns here.
洞穴中装饰着闪闪发亮的深色材料。
A green lunar seal protected by powerful guardians.
被强大的守护者捍卫的绿月封印。
A hive mind of grotesque, biological infections which aim to consume all life whilst feeling absolutely nothing.
怪异而被感染的思维，在这猩红的环境中试图抹平一切生灵。
A large explosion that will destroy most tiles
造成一次能够破坏物块的大型爆炸
A persistent arctic jet stream left a part of the world permanently cold.
极地的冰冷气流冲刷着这个世界，带来不融的冰雪。
A pet can be your best friend.
宠物可以作为你最好的朋友。
A powerful club for long distances
强力的球杆，适合长距离
A purple lunar seal protected by powerful guardians.
被强大的守护者捍卫的紫月封印。
A ragtag army of crude, barbaric goblins set out to conquer and destroy.
一群粗暴野蛮的哥布林出发远征的目的只有征服和破坏。
A red lunar seal protected by powerful guardians.
被强大的守护者捍卫的红月封印。
A room in a house can have Wood Platforms as a floor or ceiling, but NPCs need at least one solid block to stand on.
平台可以用来作为房间地板和天花板，但是NPC必须要能找到一个实心的方块才能站稳！
A seafaring horde of armed bandits that lust after the riches of the land, collecting treasures and taking no prisoners.
一群来自海上的土匪见财起意，四处劫掠而不留活口。
A slow but high damage tower that shoots piercing bolts
一个伤害高速度慢的炮台，射出穿刺的箭矢
A small explosion that will destroy most tiles
造成一次能够破坏物块的小型爆炸
A small explosion that will not destroy tiles
造成一次不会破坏物块的小型爆炸
A smooth material wrought with pleasing veins of color coat the walls of this cavern.
一种光滑的材料，带有令人愉悦的彩色脉络，覆盖了这个洞穴的墙壁。
A specialized club for finishing holes
为最后进洞所特制的球杆
A stardust guardian will protect you from nearby enemies
星尘守卫保护你免受攻击
A trap that explodes when enemies come near
一种在敌人靠近后爆炸的陷阱
A vision of a deadly omen wrought forth by a powerful cultist, often appears with reckless cosmic summoning of wyvern spirits.
死兆之星缓缓升起，飞龙之魂渐渐显现。拜月教徒带着来自宇宙的力量来了！
A well-rounded club best for mid-range distances
完善的球杆，适合中距离
Activates when a player steps on it
Advanced players may wish to remap their buttons; you can do this from the Controls Menu in Settings.
有经验的玩家或许会想要更改自己的键位：打开“设置”里面的“操作键位”就可以设置了！
After 4:30am, the sun rises in the sky and the most dangerous of beings flee from the light.
在早上4:30后，太阳在天上升起，而危险的生物都正试图逃离。
After 7:30pm, the moon rises in the sky.
在晚上7:30后，月亮在天上升起。
Afterall, what's a party without lots of guests?
毕竟，没有人的话哪里能算是派对呢？
All manner of evil things, living and dead, roam the lands in the dark.
或生或死，邪恶的怪物在暗色的大地漫行。
Allows the ability to slide down walls
Allows the collection of Vine Rope from vines
可以收集藤蔓以制成绳蔓
Allows the collection of seeds for ammo
可以收集种子作为弹药
Allows the holder to double jump
Allows the holder to quadruple jump
Allows you to return home at will
需要时可以随时传送回家
An ancient civilization of monsters dwell here.
有一个古老的文明居住在这里。
An average speed tower that shoots exploding fireballs
一种速度普通的哨卫，喷出爆裂的火球
An endless ocean stretched to the horizon awaits at the world's edge, filled with infinitely hungry creatures from the watery depths.
无尽的海洋延伸到地平线，世界的边缘，而深海之下潜藏着饥饿的巨口，随时准备吞噬误入其中的外来者。
Ancient forces prevent you from accessing this location . . .
古老的封印干扰了这次传送。
As the Hallow responds to the encroaching evils, it inadvertently awakens things that have slept beneath the sands for centuries.
在神圣应对迫近的邪恶之时，无意中唤醒了沉睡在沙漠之下数百年之物。
受到碰撞伤害后使敌方受到双倍伤害
Attacking generates a defensive barrier of titanium shards
攻击时产生防御性的钛金碎片屏障
自动给放置的物块涂色
Automatically places actuators on placed objects
自动在放置的物块上安装促动器
Automatically use mana potions when needed
需要法力值时自动使用法力药水
Ballista pierces more targets and panics when you take damage
提升弓弩炮台哨卫的穿透力，并且在你受伤后提升攻击速度
Become immune after striking an enemy
攻击敌人后获得短暂无敌
Become immune after striking an enemy,
攻击敌人后获得短暂无敌，
Become the wind, ride the lightning.
Beetles increase your melee damage and speed
甲虫提升你的近战伤害和速度
Bejeweled and elegant for soaring through the thundering skies
优雅而华丽，穿过雷电的苍穹
Bosses are easier to defeat with friends.
一般来说，在多人合力时更容易击败Boss。
Bounces back after hitting a wall
Bows and guns require the proper ammo in your Ammo Slots.
许多远程武器需要对应的弹药才能使用。是不是很合理呢？
Build a Furnace to craft metal bars out of ore.
你要制作一个熔炉才可以加工冶炼矿锭。
Can be hit with a golf club
可以使用高尔夫球杆打击
Can be worn in vanity slots
Causes stars to fall and releases bees after taking damage
受到伤害后召唤落星并且释放蜂群
Change your clothes in game at a Dresser or talk to the Stylist for a new hairdo.
想换一套衣服或发型？去梳妆台或和发型师谈谈吧！
Cheating attempt detected: Add tile spam
检测到非法作弊操作：短时间内放置上百个方块
检测到非法作弊操作：试图修改“不存在的NPC”的住所
检测到非法作弊操作：短时间内刷出几十格液体
检测到非法作弊操作：短时间内刷出上百个弹幕
Cheating attempt detected: Remove tile spam
检测到非法作弊操作：短时间内破坏数百个方块
Check with your friendly neighborhood Guide!
去找你的好帮手向导问问吧！
关闭怪物强度调整界面
关闭时间流速调整界面
Clouds are nice and soft, and you won't get hurt falling on them no matter how far you fall.
云朵优雅而轻柔，无论从多高处摔进云里，你都不会受到伤害。
Cold ice infused with even colder Corruption results in bitterly-frozen terrors lurking beneath the treacherous icy caverns.
冰中混合着更冷的腐化，令人毛骨悚然的恐怖之物潜伏在诡异的冰之洞穴之中。
Collect 3 of them to craft a Mana Crystal you can use to increase your Mana.
每收集到3个，你就可以制作一个魔法水晶来提升你的法力上限。
Combine them to make a Cloud in a Balloon.
你还可以把他们组合成云彩气球！
受到伤害后会爆炸且对敌方造成伤害。
Contains an endless amount of lava
Contains an endless amount of water
Converts Chlorophyte Bars into Shroomite Bars
将叶绿锭转换成蘑菇锭
Creates and destroys biomes when sprayed
Creates several crystal shards on impact
撞击时产生多个魔晶裂片
Creatures of evil and darkness spook the lands, killing everything in their path.
黑暗与邪恶的怪物惊扰了大地，消灭能见到的任何生灵。
Creatures which normally thrive in water may roam the land and sky.
平时在水中的小生物现在或许在地面或天空中漫行。
Deals more damage to unhurt enemies
提升对未受伤的敌人造成的伤害
Defeat the boss in The Underworld to change the World forever.
击败地狱里的Boss会导致世界发生剧变。
Defeat the current threat before you can use the pylon network!
在威胁将临时无法使用传送塔。
Demon Altars and Crimson Altars can't be destroyed with a normal hammer.
恶魔祭坛和猩红祭坛并不会被普通的锤子破坏。
Did you know you can order your Summons to attack a specific target?
你知道你可以选定召唤物的攻击目标吗？
Don't fall into lava without drinking an Obsidian Skin Potion first!
要是没有喝黑曜石皮肤药水，那可就要小心别掉进岩浆里。
Don't shake a Snow Globe unless you want to summon the Frost Legion.
除非您想召唤冰霜军团，否则请勿摇动雪球仪。
Don't worry, they'll be back in the morning.
没事，他们等到早上就会回来了。
Double click on the Map to ping a location for everyone to see!
双击小地图即可提醒其他玩家！
Double tap {0} to call an ancient storm to the cursor location
双击{0}在光标位置召唤远古风暴
不惮辛劳不惮烦，釜中沸沫已成澜
Drops cursed flames on the ground
During a Blood Moon, Zombies can open doors.
在血月期间，僵尸可以打开门。
During a Solar Eclipse, be on the lookout for tons of strange and creepy monsters.
在日食期间，要小心面对独特而奇诡的怪物群。
Enables auto swing for melee weapons
可以长按鼠标自动挥舞近战武器。
Enables solid blocks to be toggled on and off
使实体物块能够被虚化
Endless dunes of sand reside here, scorched by the never-ending sun.
烈日烧灼着无边的沙丘。
Enemies are less likely to target you
降低存在感，不容易被敌人攻击
Enemies are more likely to target you
提升存在感，更容易被敌人攻击。
Enemies aren't the only danger when exploring Underground.
探索地下时怪物并不是唯一的危险来源。
Eventually, Life Fruit will grow in the Jungle, and can give you an extra boost to your health.
生命之果生长在丛林里，可以在生命水晶之后继续提升生命力。
Every step is cold and dangerous.
在这里踏出的每一步都充满了危险和冷意。
Explodes into a swarm of bees
Explosive Traps recharge faster and oil enemies
提升爆炸陷阱哨卫充能速度，并给敌人造成“油腻”状态
Falling Stars sometimes appear at night.
落星有时会在晚上出现。
Familiar creatures of horror rapidly grip the lands this day, for no mere mortal can resist the evil of the blackened sun.
熟悉的生物在这个白天变得恐怖起来：没有谁能抵挡暗日的邪恶气息。
受到许多高级建筑师的青睐
Feeling up for the chill of winter?
Few things have adapted to survive in this environment.
想在这种环境下生存，就必须做出适应。
Find a Guide Voodoo Doll and hurl it into the infernal lava to summon him.
找到一个向导巫毒娃娃并把它丢下岩浆，你就能看到这个恐怖之物。
First they invade your world, and then they move into your houses!
他们先侵入这个世界，然后住进你的家里。
Fishing is a fantastic source of crafting ingredients, accessories, and loot crates!
钓鱼是合成材料、饰品和宝藏匣的绝佳来源！
Fishing line will never break, Decreases chance of bait consumption, Increases fishing power
鱼竿不会断线，降低消耗鱼饵的几率，提升渔力
Flameburst field of view and range are dramatically increased
巨幅提升爆裂魔焰哨卫的攻击范围
Flower petals will fall on your target for extra damage
攻击会附带高速的山铜花瓣，造成额外的伤害。
For reasons beyond any meteorological explanation, slimy things are raining down from above by the buckets!
由于超自然的原因，天空中正有一块块黏糊糊的东西掉下来！
Friendly Truffles will sometimes make themselves at home in Surface Mushroom Biomes.
友好的松露人有时会让自己在地表蘑菇生态中居家。
Fully researched items can be created freely
研究完毕的物品可以无限刷取
Gel can be obtained by defeating slimes.
凝胶一般可以通过打败史莱姆来获得。
Gives a chance to dodge attacks
受到攻击时有几率闪避
Golf balls will carry a good distance with decent vertical loft
合适的角度将使高尔夫球飞出一个优秀的距离。
Golf balls will stay close to the ground over short distances for precision shots
精确的打击使高尔夫球稍微离地，飞行小段距离。
Got some extra walls or platforms?
有一些多余的背景墙或平台？
Gotta wonder who stuck a tome of infinite wisdom on a stick...
真好奇谁把这些含有无尽智慧的书固定在棍子上了
Granite paves the way for progress in architectural fashion and durable monsters.
作为材料，花岗岩为时尚的建筑和厚实的怪物付出了一份力。
Grants immunity to knockback and fire blocks
使你免疫击退和物块灼伤
使你免疫大部分负面状态
Grants the ability to swim and greatly extends underwater breathing
大幅提升水下呼吸时间，并且可以游泳
Grappling Hooks are invaluable tools for exploration.
钩爪是探索时的无价之宝。
大幅强化弓弩炮台哨卫
大幅强化爆炸陷阱哨卫
大幅强化爆裂魔焰哨卫
大幅强化闪电光环哨卫
Greatly increases life regeneration after striking an enemy
攻击敌人后大幅提升生命恢复速度
Has a chance to create illusions and dodge an attack
受到攻击时有几率闪避
Has a chance to poison enemies
Have something on the Map to show a friend?
想在地图标记点什么给队友？
He comes to town after the Frost Legion is defeated (and 'tis the season).
如果你击败了冰霜军团，他就会来到你的小镇（如果季节没错的话）。
He rewards random items, entertained by any misfortunes.
他给的回报时好时坏，还整天对你的不幸比加以嘲笑。
观众朋友们我想死你们了！
Higher valued coins do more damage
高级硬币造成更高伤害
Hitting enemies will sometimes drop extra coins
攻击敌人时有几率掉落更多金钱
可以托住艾特尼亚水晶
Ice serves as a catalyst for the blessing, the Hallow's luminous source of power.
冰可以作为祝福的催化剂，也就是神圣的力量之源。
If an enemy steals your money after you die in Expert Mode, hunt it down!
在专家模式里，怪物可以捡走你的钱。
If only someone could lift his curse...
不过，前提是他身上的诅咒被解除了。
If only there were a way to purify him .
如果能把他净化回税收官的话...
If only there were a way to purify him . . .
如果能把他净化回税收官的话...
If they scan you, they'll summon a Martian Invasion!
如果你被它们扫到了，火星人可能就要入侵了！
If you defeat it, you can get your money back.
要是你的钱被捡走了，那就去追杀它抢回来吧！
If you dig deep enough, you'll end up in The Underworld!
如果你挖得足够深，那就能挖到地狱！
If you don't trust them, use a Safe or Piggy Bank; those items have storage that is exclusive to each player.
如果你不信任他们，请使用保险柜或猪猪储蓄罐；它们为每个玩家提供私有的的存储空间。
If you ever defeat any giant robots, a Steampunker might move in to your World.
在你击败了任何某些巨大的机械后，蒸汽朋克人可能会进入您的世界。
If you ever want to get stylish, try dyes!
想变得时髦？试下染色吧！
If you find a Magic Mirror, you can use it to teleport back to your spawn point.
如果你有一个魔镜，就可以使用它来传送回生成点。
If you find one, he might move in.
如果你找到了一些枪，他就可能会入住。
If you get lost or need to find another player, open the World Map.
如果你迷路了或想要找到其他玩家，那就打开大地图看看吧！
If you like rockets, the Cyborg may have some for sale.
喜欢火箭弹？赛博人那可有不少！
If you need a new haircut, go check out a nearby Spider Biome.
如果想要来个新发型，那就去周围的蜘蛛洞找找吧！
If you need to remove background walls, craft a hammer!
如果要拆除背景墙，那就要制作锤子。
If you open them, you can find all sorts of spooky items.
他们里面藏着各种节日物品...
If you save up enough, one might move in!
如果你身上有足够多的钱，那多半就会有商人入住！
If you store your Coins in a Chest or Piggy Bank, you will be less likely to lose them.
如果把钱存在猪猪储蓄罐或宝箱里，那你就不会在死亡时丢失钱。
If you're sick of getting knocked around, try equipping a Cobalt Shield.
如果不想被击退所扰乱，那就试着装备一个钴蓝盾吧！
If your Inventory is full, you can press {InputTriggerUI_Trash} to send items to the Trash.
如果背包满了，那就按下 {InputTriggerUI_Trash}来把它丢进垃圾堆吧！
If your house doesn't have background walls, monsters will be able to spawn inside.
如果你的房子没有背景墙，那么怪物就有可能刷新在里面！
Immunity to Weakness and Broken Armor
Improved ability if combined with Shoe Spikes
与鞋钉合成后效果更佳
In this deadly place, there lurk arachnids with many legs, many eyes, and a thirst for blood.
危险的巢穴里游荡着一些坏家伙。多腿。多眼。渴血。
提升物块和背景墙放置速度
Increases block placement & tool range by 3
Increases breath time and allows breathing in water
提升水下呼吸时间，并且可以在水中呼吸
Increases chance to get a crate
提升钓到宝藏匣的几率
Increases defense by 5 when placed nearby
放置在周围时提升5防御力
Increases jump height and negates fall damage
提升跳跃高度，而且不会受到摔落伤害
Increases jump speed and allows auto-jump
提升跳跃速度，并且可以自动连跳
Increases length of invincibility after taking damage
提升受到伤害后的无敌时间
Increases maximum mana by 80 and reduces mana usage by 17%
提升80法力上限，降低17%法力消耗
Increases pickup range for mana stars
提升物块放置速度和范围
Increases the defense and strength of all villagers
Increases your max number of minions
Increases your max number of minions by 1
Increases your max number of sentries
Increases your max number of sentries by 1 and reduces mana costs by 10%
提升哨卫数量上限，减少10%法力消耗
Increases your max number of sentries by 2
Info accessories don't need to be equipped to provide you and nearby friends with useful information; you can just leave them in your Inventory.
信息类饰品可以为你和附近的人提供信息，甚至不需要装备起来！只需要把它们放在背包里就可以生效。
It is rumored that there is a land far above the clouds, where ancient treasures are guarded by powerful winged creatures.
有传言说，在遥远的云层之上有一块土地，远古宝藏被强大的飞行生物所保护着。
这玩意儿不是九块九毛九的吗
It's a great time to explore!
It's worth it to explore your Oceans.
Keep an explosive in your inventory or a storage container to attract a Demolitionist to your house.
爆破专家？他只会在你背包里有爆炸物时入住。
Keep an eye out for Goodie Bags around Halloween.
留意万圣节前后的福袋。
杀小兔兔非 常 残 忍。
Kites can be flown on windy days
Life Crystals are hidden around the World.
生命水晶隐藏在地图各处。
Life Crystals not enough for you?
生命水晶无法提升你的生命力了？
Life regen is increased when near a campfire
在篝火附近时提升生命恢复速度
Lightning Aura can now crit and strikes faster
提升闪电光环哨卫的攻击速度，并且有几率造成暴击
Look for them on Floating Islands.
你可以在浮空岛上找到它们。
Magic damage done to enemies heals the player with lowest health
造成的魔法伤害会吸取生命，治疗血量最低的玩家
Magic damage done will hurt extra nearby enemies
造成魔法伤害后会造成额外的溅射伤害
Magic damage has a chance to spawn buff boosters,
造成魔法伤害后有几率出现强化星云，
Major improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration
大幅提升所有属性，提升生命恢复速度
Make sure you have valid housing with empty rooms, and you may attract new inhabitants to your World.
这个世界有许多友好的居民，不过你要有符合要求的空房子才能吸引他们入住。
May confuse nearby enemies after being struck
受到攻击后有几率对周围的敌人造成“混乱”
Medium improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration
中幅提升所有属性，提升生命恢复速度
Melee and ranged attacks cause frostburn
近战及远程攻击会造成霜焰伤害
Minions from Etheria - they may have mistakenly invaded this world, but they wish to rule it nonetheless!
虽然这些来自艾特尼亚的随从们虽然是不小心来到这里的，但这并不会影响他们的征服欲。
Minor improvements to all stats and increased life regeneration
小幅提升所有属性，提升生命恢复速度
Minor improvements to melee stats & lowered defense
小幅提升近战属性，降低防御力
Minor increase to damage, melee speed, critical strike chance,
小幅提升5%伤害、近战速度、暴击率、
Mounts grant the player increased mobility and a variety of useful abilities.
坐骑会强化你的移动能力，还有各种有帮助的效果。
Mushroom Biomes can be grown above ground as well as below.
蘑菇生态环境既可以在地上也可以在地下生长。
Nature is throwing a party and wishes to sweep everybody - and everything - off their feet!
这大风就像是要把所有人和所有事物都从地面上吹走一样。
Nearby players get a bonus against:
附近的玩家可获得对以下怪物的加成：
New enemies, reduced visibility, and it can even be hard to move!
新的敌人，黑暗的视野，而且还难以移动！
并非所有骷髅都是邪恶的。
Not moving puts you in stealth,
原地不动会进入潜行状态，
Not sure what to do next?
Nothing improves your mobility like Wings.
难道有什么能比用翅膀飞行更好的移动方式吗？
Often used to manifest one's will as a physical form of defense
通常用来把心意实体化为守卫的力量
On this not-so-silent night, festive beings wish to shower the world with gifts of blood and carnage.
在这个不太平静的夜里，许多节日客人准备带来一些鲜红的礼物...只是没那么喜庆。
Once enough of <item name> is researched, it will be available infinitely!
研究足够数量的<item name>后，就可以无限刷取了！
Once you use a Life Crystal, a Nurse might move in!
一旦你使用了生命水晶，护士就可能会入住！
Only Journey characters may enter a Journey server.
非旅途模式玩家无法进入旅途模式地图。
Only Non-Journey characters may enter a Non-Journey server.
旅途模式玩家无法进入非旅途模式地图。
Only the first shot consumes ammo
Only the hardiest of beasts can survive this harsh region.
只有最抗寒的野兽才能在这片区域生存。
打开怪物强度调整界面
打开时间流速调整界面
Other players can loot your chests!
其他玩家可以偷走你宝箱里的东西！
海盗的行为真是难以预测。
Place in the Eternia Crystal Stand to summon Etheria's portals
放在艾特尼亚水晶座上来打开传送门
Portals cannot be created on the surface of these blocks
传送门无法放置在这些物块之上。
与控制时间有关的能力
与控制天气有关的能力
Press the + and - keys to zoom in & out!
Press {InputTrigger_SmartCursor} to switch between Cursor Modes.
Protect yourself by equipping an Obsidian Skull or similar accessory.
不过如果你装备着黑曜石头颅或类似的饰品，那就不是问题了。
Provides life regeneration and reduces the cooldown of healing potions by 25%
提升生命恢复速度，并且降低25%回复药水的冷却时间
Provides light under water and extra mobility on ice
提升在冰上的移动能力，并且在水下提供照明
Pumpkins grow wildly across the land, and certain creatures masquerade in unusual costumes.
南瓜在这片土地上疯狂生长，还有些奇装异服的家伙开始搞事。
快速堆叠进附近的箱子
Regular Wood and Stone not vibrant enough for you?
普通的木头和石头对你来说还不够充满生气？
消耗{0}个进行研究即可无限刷取
Riding Minecarts is one of the best ways of getting around.
乘坐矿车是一种方便的出行方式。
Rocket science gave us Rocket Boots.
研发“火箭”科技，获得火箭靴
Rope can really help you get around while exploring caves.
绳索可以帮助你在探索洞穴时移动。
Seeds can be used to grow a variety of useful ingredients for crafting potions.
种子可以种出许多制作药水用的材料。
Set oiled enemies on fire for extra damage
提升“油腻”状态的敌人所受的火焰伤害
She can tell you the state of Corruption, Crimson, and Hallow in your World.
她能告诉你地图上的腐化、猩红和神圣程度。
Shoots bees that will chase your enemy
Shoots splitting arrows, deals more damage to airborne enemies
射出分裂箭矢，并且对空中的目标造成额外的伤害
Slay a boss to attract a Dryad to your house.
击败一个Boss后可以吸引树妖入住。
Solar shields charge over time to protect you & let you dash
日耀护盾随时间充能，并且可以
Some angler fish are content to lie in wait for their prey, but these are perfectly happy to aggressively chase down an underwater meal.
这些凶猛的食肉鱼类常常休息着守株待兔，不过在也十分乐意主动猎取食物。
Some are even known to sell unique items to those that can find them.
其中甚至有一些以其出售的独特商品而闻名。
Some ores require better pickaxes to mine.
有一些矿石需要高级的镐子才能挖掘。
其中一部分甚至还会用一些偏门的黑魔法。
Sometimes you can find NPCs hidden around the World.
有时你会在世界各地发现隐藏的NPC。
Sometimes, enemies may even invade from other dimensions .
有时，入侵的敌人甚至可能来自其他位面。
Sometimes, enemies may even invade from other dimensions . . .
有时，入侵的敌人甚至可能来自其他位面。
Speak to her for healing at any time .
你可以随时向她寻求治疗...
Speak to her for healing at any time . . .
你可以随时向她寻求治疗...
Spits an Ichor stream on contact
击中敌人后裂出一股脓液
喷吐出削减防御力的龙息
Sprays out a shower of water
Spreads the Crimson to some blocks
Strong entities take advantage of this light.
强大的生灵从圣光中汲取力量。
Stylists always end up lost in them!
理发师经常在那附近迷路。
Summons a baby finch to fight for you
召唤一只麻雀宝宝为你而战
Summons a cloud to rain blood on your foes
召唤一朵血云在敌人身上淋下血雨
Summons a cursed sapling to follow you
Summons a heart to provide light
Summons a powerful leaf crystal to shoot at nearby enemies
召唤强大的叶绿晶体攻击附近的敌人
Summons a rideable dark horse mount
Summons a wall of cursed flames
Summons bats to attack your enemies
召唤一群蝙蝠攻击敌人
Summons killer bees after striking your foe
击中敌人后召唤嗜杀蜂群
召唤即将到来的末日之灾
Take a look at the Achievement Guide for a clue!
看看“成就指南”来寻找线索吧！
Technologically advanced beings from another world who want to eradicate all primitive life with their superior weaponry.
来自异界的先进科技和它们的主人试图使用优越的武器抹杀所有原始的生灵。
Temporarily increase critical chance after dodge
闪避后短暂提升暴击率
The Angler, a rude fishing genius, sends others to find weird, rare fish.
渔夫，粗鲁的天才，常常差遣别人去寻找稀有的怪奇鱼类。
The Arms Dealer knows more about guns than anyone.
军火商人比任何人都更了解枪支。
The Cloud in a Bottle and Shiny Red Balloon accessories both improve your ability to jump.
瓶中云彩和闪亮红气球这样的饰品可以提高你的跳跃能力。
The Corruption is full of chasms.
The Corruption's hold in the sandstone weakened the seals that held an assortment of ancient magicked beings at bay.
砂岩中的腐化侵蚀着远古的封印，逐步唤起魔化之物。
The Crimson's bloody veins broke up the tombs that once held magicked beings, which are now released to commit mayhem.
猩红的脉络渗入了封印魔化之物的墓中，释放出一片混乱。
The Dye Trader can help you turn some materials into new dye colors.
染料商人可以帮你把材料制成染料。
The Goblin Tinkerer found in Underground Caverns will sell you many useful items, including a Tinkerer's Workshop.
在地下洞穴中发现的哥布林工匠出售许多有用的物品，例如合成饰品用的工匠作坊。
The Hallow is the only place where Corruption and Crimson cannot spread.
神圣之地是腐化和猩红无法侵入的地方。
The Housing section of the Equipment Menu allows you to decide what rooms you want your NPCs to live in.
你可以在装备栏的“住房”页面里调整NPC居住的房间。
The Mechanic got lost in the Dungeon.
电路专家迷失在地牢里。
The Old Man at the Dungeon is a Clothier.
地牢门口的老人是一个裁缝。
The Party Girl won't move in unless your World is full of other townsfolk.
派对女孩？她只会在地图里住满了NPC的时候入住。
The Tavernkeep is a guest from a faraway land called Etheria.
旅店老板是来自遥远的艾特尼亚的客人。
The Tax Collector spends his days wandering the Underworld as a Tortured Soul.
受折磨的灵魂终日游荡在地狱里。
The Traveling Merchant never stays in one place for long, but he always brings different wares when he visits!
旅行商人永远不会在一个地方呆很长时间，但是每次总能带来不同的商品！
The Valkyrie Satellite Barrier Platform is totally safe.
女武神卫星防御屏障是完全安全的。
The Void Bag is a magical artifact that will store items for you when your inventory is full.
虚空宝袋是一个神奇造物，可以在你的背包装满的时候继续储存物品！
The Wizard sells some useful magic artifacts, but he has a tendency to wander off Underground.
巫师会出售一些有用的魔法造物，不过他一般只在地下出现。
The best wizards around use Mana Flowers.
这里最好的巫师都会使用法力花！
The blessing swept through the ancient sands, awakening dangerous creatures once forgotten to time.
神圣祝福穿过了尘封的沙漠，唤醒了被遗忘的危险生物。
The book's knowledge empowers your villagers!
这本书的知识传达了出去...
The clandestine pools of water glittering in the desert sun are the only source of life in these desolate sands.
在这些荒凉的沙滩上，闪闪发光的秘密水池是唯一的生命之源。
The fragments left behind from plummeting meteorites burn endlessly with astrological energy, some of which appears to be alive.
坠落的陨石碎块留下的星能似乎可以无尽的燃烧下去，仿佛有着生命一般
The license teleports away to the bunny delivery service...
兔兔许可证已传印至兔兔分发中心。
The license teleports away to the cat delivery service...
猫猫许可证已传印至猫猫分发中心。
The license teleports away to the dog delivery service...
狗狗许可证已传印至狗狗分发中心。
The most vile, stone-cold entities emerge in the blinding chaos of bone-piercing icy wind and snow.
最为邪恶无情的怪物从这刺骨寒风暴雪的混乱中现出。
The sands of the desert rage like a stormy sea, with deadly creatures swimming among them.
大漠中的沙子如同肆虐的大海，里面游荡着致命的怪物。
The spirit of Christmas spreads cheer...
The spirit of Halloween penetrates the air...
The wearer can run super fast
There are Floating Islands in the sky.
There are not enough villagers near that pylon to access it
目标传送塔周围的居民数量不足，无法运转。
There are not enough villagers near the current pylon
当前传送塔周围的居民数量不足，无法运转。
There's always time for a celebration!
These bitterly cold caverns of ice, saturated with the blood of Crimson, host a new variety of menacing frozen fiends.
这些冰冷的山洞里充满了猩红之血，居住着各种令人生畏的邪恶。
These crab-like creatures scuttle about in glowing mushroom fields, heavily infested by the fungal spores.
这些螃蟹般的生物在蘑菇地中爬行，其中已被无尽的真菌感染。
These macabre creatures seek to add fresh meat to their dripping ranks.
毛骨悚然的它们还希望为队伍中增添新的同伴。
They can be crafted from numerous materials such as Wood, Glass, or even Bones.
你可以用各种材料制作，例如说木头、玻璃，甚至骨头都行！
They sow thick webs threaded with malice.
Thick trees, brambled vines, and relentless beasts of nature inhabit this dense canopy of lush growth, sprouted from seemingly limitless mud.
茂密的树木，带刺的藤蔓，无情的野兽和稀有的饰品藏在无边无尽的淤泥之间。
This cloud in particular is especially livid!
而这朵云想必就是点睛之笔了。
This day, for no particular reason, everyone decided to throw a party.
没有什么特殊原因，大家就是想开个排队！
This one representing a deep celestial void known as 'vortex'.
它象征着无尽般的虚无，“漩涡”
This one representing a flaming celestial event known as 'solar flares'.
它象征着燃焰般的星闪，“日耀”
This one representing a glittering celestial remnant known as 'stardust'.
它象征着微光般的星碎，“星尘”
This one representing a stormy celestial body known as 'nebula'.
它象征着云雾般的星体，“星云”
This organized family of cold-hearted killers wish to ice any who cross them, and they don't like snitches... capisce?
这一群高度组织的无情杀手要咔擦掉所有忤逆者... 和告密者。识得唔识得啊？
This pylon is not in the correct biome to use
传送塔环境不匹配，无法运转。
Throws a counterweight after hitting an enemy with a yoyo
使用悠悠球击中敌人后，投出花式平衡锤
时间可以治愈所有伤口。
Time to celebrate with twinkling lights, ugly sweaters, and a fat old fellow wearing a bright red suit.
叮叮当，叮叮当，铃儿响叮当~
To craft potions, place a Bottle on a Table to make an Alchemy Station.
想要制作药水，就要把瓶子放在桌子上来当炼金术站。
Torches and Glowsticks can be a light for you in dark places when all other lights go out.
当你在黑暗当中时，火把和荧光棒能够为你提供照明。
Torches require Wood and Gel to craft.
你可以使用木头和凝胶来制作火把。
Torches won't work underwater, but Glowsticks will.
火把不能在水下生效，但荧光棒可以。
Toss in water up to 3 times to increase fishing power
可抛出至多三次以提升渔力
Tough monsters, abandoned cabins, and golden treasure adorn the dark, vacant caverns tunneled beneath the underground.
厚实的怪物，废弃的小屋和金色的宝藏装饰着地下地下黑暗又空旷的洞穴。
Try crafting them with Hooks or gems.
试着用钩子或宝石制作一个吧！
Turns the holder into a werewolf at night and a merfolk when entering water
晚上是狼人，水里是鱼人...还有什么？
Unlocks a Corruption Chest in the dungeon
打开地牢中的腐化宝箱
Unlocks a Crimson Chest in the dungeon
打开地牢中的猩红宝箱
Use "suspicious looking items" at your own risk!
使用“可疑”类物品时风险自负。
Use a Naughty Present to summon the Frost Moon!
使用顽皮的礼物来召唤霜月吧！
Use them to increase your health.
使用它们可以提高你的生命值上限。
Used for crafting a Corruption Key
可以用于制作腐化钥匙
Used for crafting a Crimson Key
Used to smelt adamantite and titanium ore
用于熔炼精金和钛金矿石
Walking on Hellstone and Meteorite can burn you!
在狱炎石和陨石上行走时会灼伤！
Want to know what you can make?
Wear a Mining Helmet if you don't want to use Torches.
采矿头盔？它也能提供照明，如果你不想用火把的话，可以试一下。
Wearing a full set of armor crafted from the same material gives you an extra bonus.
穿一身同系列成套的装备多半能获得额外的套装效果！
When a Man Eater consumes enough human flesh, it undergoes a cocoon-like metamorphosis into a far deadlier form.
食人花长大后会变成更恐怖的样子。
When a Sandstorm hits, deserts can be very dangerous.
沙尘暴袭来时，沙漠可能非常危险。
When areas of death become littered with graves, a thick mist of concentrated eeriness blankets the land.
遍布着坟墓的地方，一层恐怖的浓雾慢慢笼罩。
When dealing with a Goblin Army, crowd control is key.
当面对哥布林军团时，范围控场很重要。
When exploring, it helps to keep some Platforms on hand.
随身带着一些平台对你探索应该有帮助。
When severe storms roll through, it is said that the skies are angry.
据传暴雨是上天的愤怒。
When speaking to a vendor, you can sell items in your Inventory by pressing {InputTriggerUI_SellItem}.
在NPC商店里，你可以按{InputTriggerUI_SellItem}出售背包里的物品。
When the Corruption grows through the desert, vile things long since buried in the sand awaken with pure malice.
在腐化传透沙漠之时，埋葬在沙中的邪恶之物带着纯粹的恶意醒来。
When the moon rises drenched in blood, the dead rise with it!
当月亮在猩红中升起时，逝去之物也随之归来。
While holding a Summoning Weapon, Right Click an enemy!
手持召唤武器时，右键点击敌人试试！
Will cause rain to start falling
Will cause rain to stop falling
With the Block Swap mechanic enabled, you can replace one block with another directly, rather than having to mine it first.
启用“物块替换”后，你可以直接在方块上放置来替换，而不需要提前把旧的挖掉！
With the Crimson seeping through the sands, dark things long forgotten rise again to seek out and destroy life.
当猩红在沙漠上蔓延，早已被遗忘的黑暗之物又重新崛起，寻找并摧毁生灵。
Wooden arrows turn into a column of bees
将木箭转变成一列蜂群
You are not close enough to a pylon to teleport with the pylon network
距离传送塔过远，无法使用。
You can assign your favorite items to the DPad for rapid use by enabling DPad Hotbar in Gamepad Settings!
在手柄设置中启用手柄快捷栏后，就可以把物品关联到快捷栏上一键使用了！
You can build your own tracks, or find them Underground.
你可以建造自己的轨道，也可以在地下找到一些现成的。
You can buy Wires from the Mechanic and use them to create traps, pumping systems, or other elaborate devices.
你可以从电路专家手里买到电线，然后使用它们来建出陷阱、水泵和其他复杂的电路设施。
You can change your spawn point by placing and using a bed.
你可以通过放置和使用床来更改生成点。
You can check if a room is valid housing from the Housing section of the Inventory Menu.
你可以在背包界面的“住房”按钮处检查一个房屋是否可以居住。
You can continuously use some items by holding down the {InputTrigger_UseOrAttack} button.
有些物品可以在按住{InputTrigger_UseOrAttack}后可以连续使用。
You can destroy Shadow Orbs and Crimson Hearts with a hammer or explosives, but prepare yourself for the forces they unleash.
你可以使用锤子或爆炸物摧毁暗影之珠或猩红之心，但是在那之前要准备好应对后果。
You can even craft it into a Rope Coil which can be thrown and automatically unfolds!
你甚至可以将其制作成绳圈，丢出就可以自动展开！
You can find one in the Dungeon.
You can find treasure, dyes, and even sleeping fishermen.
宝藏、染料，甚至还能找到一个睡着的渔夫！
You can harvest Cobwebs and turn them into Silk.
你可以收集蜘蛛网，然后织成丝绸。
You can plant Acorns to grow new trees.
你可以使用种子来植树。
You can remove Torches with {InputTrigger_InteractWithTile} or with a pickaxe.
你可以使用{InputTrigger_InteractWithTile}或镐子来拆除火把。
You can turn them back into their original materials!
你可以将它们恢复成原来的材料！
You can use Hallowed Seeds, Holy Water, or Pearlstone to make Hallow spread.
您可以使用神圣之种，神圣之水或珍珠石来传播神圣环境。
You can use Silk to craft beds, sofas, and more!
丝绸可以用来制作床、沙发和许多家具！
You can wear Buckets on your head!
你还可以把水桶套在头上！
You could get a Witch Doctor to come to your World if you defeat the Queen Bee.
在击败蜂后以后，你应该能见到一个入住的巫医。
You have no permission for this power
你没有权限使用这个能力
你需要用到一些高级的工具。
You won't take falling damage if you have a Lucky Horseshoe.
如果你装备有幸运马蹄铁，就不会受到摔落伤害。
You'll have to help her out if you want her to move in.
如果你想得到她的帮助，就要先解救她。
and increases your max number of minions by 2
提升2个召唤物数量上限
increasing ranged ability and reducing chance for enemies to target you
提升远程攻击属性，且敌人会优先攻击其他玩家
increasing ranged ability and reducing chance for enemies to target you but slowing movement speed
提升远程攻击属性，且敌人会优先攻击其他玩家，但移动速度变慢
life regeneration, defense, mining speed, and minion knockback
生命恢复速度、防御力、挖掘速度和召唤物击退。
pick boosters up to get stacking buffs
允许好友的好友加入：关
允许好友的好友加入：开

启动另一个泰拉瑞亚来加入！
